value: L 20 77 St Georges Terrace, Perth, 6000, WA, Australia

7379 - Computer Related Services, Not Elsewhere Classified Summary > HBIS GROUP AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover computer related services, not elsewhere classified. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. HBIS GROUP AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is headquartered in Perth, Western Australia. It is headed by director Ernest Bryon. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $35.04 million. Its net profit totalled $23.88 million. HBIS GROUP AUSTRALIA PTY LTD forms part of the services industry sector.
